name: bowdlerization
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the action of removing or changing words or parts from a book, play, or film that are considered to be unsuitable or offensive: His editorial work included some bowdlerisation of rather crude folk tales. The film versions of these classic works were no more than pathetic bowdlerizations of the originals. Related words
